resources.string: requestCode in intent does not match the parent requestCode

string-array.name: todo
string-array.item: Make at least one person laugh

string-array.name: todo_detail
string-array.item: Wake up is generally not a pleasant activity but it does happen once a day!
Jogging helps improve stamina and burn unwanted calories!
Caffeine consumption is not a todo, it happens naturally.
Follow up the RFC for humour and JokeML
Today, I planted 2 trees, really! see here: https://www.plant-tree.org/
Eat your 5 a day fruits to stay strong and healthy/
Play football to keep fit and healthy
At least 7 hours is compulsory; drink milky coffee.
